reviewText: Love the show. Been a fan since high school. Unfortunately this special was made by PBS and it shows. I was expecting a more in-depth documentary of the show. Its still a good special with the original cast. Enjoyed it, but still wished for more.
It was not what I expected it to be. The movie was more based on how Red Green was created versus the actual programs.

I have been a big fan of The Red Green Show ever since I was a child. I may be an American, but I did enjoy the Canadian humor. I enjoyed seeing the cast members as themselves for a little reunion and Steve Smith is the nicest guy I have ever met since I met him in person whenever he is on tour as Red.
